title: 9/11 Families Protest at Saudi-Backed LIV Golf Tournament
description: The families are furious that former President Donald J. Trump once blamed Saudi Arabia for the terrorist attacks, but is now allowing his golf course to be used for its LIV Golf event.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:description: Brett Eagleson, president of 9/11 Justice and the son of John Bruce Eagleson, who died in the South Tower of the World Trade Center, joined other family members of Sept. 11 victims and survivors in a protest of the LIV Golf tournament.
